question.qText: "The Russian Revolution occurred primarily due to the effects of World War I."

aBtn.aText: Russia lost most of its major battles during WWI.
The Romanovs controlled Russia for nearly 300 years and the Russians were eager for change.
The Treaty of Brest-Litovsk officially took Russia out of the War.
During the war, millions of Russian soldiers died and those at home suffered food shortages.
Vladimir Lenin led the Bolshevik Revolution in October, 1917, and established a communist economic system.
